"I've heard quite a great deal about you: "It's not that I don't believe you but I'd still like to confirm that with my own eyes, OK?"
"That's a event called \"Time Attack\". Go on ahead to compete and complete all targets."
"Prove that you can clear it all within the time limit and I'll judge you again. You can choose the easiest difficulty if you want."
"Records will be logged and in return you'll get rewards. Not a bad deal for you."
